status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dk03s","text":"Wash with 1X PBS (Phosphate Buffered Saline, 10X solution, Fisher bioreagents, BP399-1)     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":88,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":90,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"72k7q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"","id":0,"number":"7.4"}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"3 times","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6768j","text":"Wash with 1X PBS containing  0.2% Triton X-100 (Sigma-Aldrich, X100-1L) (PBS-T).   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":81,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"955o9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"768CC507409C11EFB3270A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"3 times","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bstq","text":"Blocking step with appropriate normal serum (use serum from the source species for the secondary antibodies to prevent nonspecific binding). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bdmu8","text":"Incubate with 4% NDS (Normal Donkey Serum, Jackson ImmunoResearch, 017-000-121) in PBS-T.   at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":90,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":95,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8j30r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"minimum","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c2fsu","text":"Incubate with primary antibodies in PBS-T with 4% NDS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dnr8","text":"  at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2b826","text":"Wrap well-plate air-tight with parafilm and cover with foil.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cv34n","text":"Rabbit anti-GFP polyclonal antibody, Invitrogen, A11122 (*Upon arrival: Diluted 1:1 in glycerol by adding same volume 100% glycerol, and stored at -20C). Dilution: 1:1000 to have a final dilution of 1:2000. Example:   anti-GFP +  PBS-T 4% NDS  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":216,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":229,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fvqdb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"999","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7lv2l","text":"Incubate with secondary antibodies in 1X PBS-T.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"coeg","text":"  at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"691pg","text":"Cover well-plate with foil. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9d0iu","text":"AlexaFluor 488 Donkey anti-rabbit, Jackson ImmunoResearch, 711-545-152 (*Upon arrival: Reconstituted with ~0.4 ml 50% glycerol and stored at -20C). Dilution: 1:400. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjvi8","text":"Example:   D@Rb488 +   PBS-T","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4bmaf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"399","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3s227","text":"Let dry on a slide holder (VWR, 48429-105). Cover from light","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fmbdt","text":"Rinse with ddH2O. Briefly dip slide in a 50mL falcon tube filled with ddH2O","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2lt3o","text":"Place back on slide holder and let dry covered from light","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bc67q","text":"Apply ~ of Fluoromount-G Fluorescent mounting medium (SouthernBiotech, 0100-01) with 0.5 μg/ml DAPI (Millipore, 10236276001) on dried slides and apply coverslip (2980-225, Corning)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bqk9k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"120","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bd5dd","text":"Protect from light and dry overnight before imaging","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1l05l","text":"GFP or YFP amplification. This protocol can also be applied to other epitopes/antibodies.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1org1","text":"Use a 24-well plate. Place a maximum of 12 sections / well. Use  / well for washes and blocking. Use from   to   / well for antibody incubations. Use fire-shaped blunted Pasteur glass pipette or thin brush to transfer section from 1 well to another. Place well plate on shaker, rocker, or belly dancer for all washes and incubation steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":64,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":106,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":111,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"1DA110E040A011EFBFD50A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"1DA1115840A011EFBFD50A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"750","error":false,"guid":"1DA111C840A011EFBFD50A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6jg7m","text":"Discard any sections found stuck to side of wells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"81ttf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
